free_text.Prerequisite for: Hydrodynamics, Mechanics of continuous media, Elasticity[br/]
free_text.Content: Fluid-Structure interaction[br/][li] Analytical methods in fluid-structure interaction[br/]   - Linear theory and methods[br/]   - Nonlinear theory and methods[br/][li] Simulation techniques in fluid-structure interaction[br/]   - Linear (frequencies)[br/]   - Nonlinear (time)

free_text.Learning outcomes: Principles of Fluid-Structure interaction. Introduction to Aeroelasticity.  Unsteady aerodynamics, applications in aeronautics and turbomacinery[br/]Introduce the coupling approach of different mechanical systems (structures) with aerodynamic forces (fluid). Formulation and solution methods for fluid structure interaction. Energy methods. Frequeny Domain, Time domain, Computational methods ALE. Experimental methods. Applications[br/]
